name: Choose-a-mech
description:
The gang asked me if I could code their idea of a game where you can select between and equip different mechs. Thing is they asked me to help some 10 hours before the submission deadline, and I can't do an all-nighter for I have to work tomorrow...

So... I delivered something in 5 hours...

Enter the store, select a mech by moving arounds (WSAD or arrows), then purchase it.

Sadly they're mass produced, any customization was lost in the short time.
